pullrequest.title: Upgrade to fuel-tools1 and automatically update paths -> pull request #2800

content.raw:
I just uploaded a model to fuel which is not in gazebo_models, so it's easier to test making sure Gazebo can't fetch the resources from somewhere else:

https://ignitionfuel.org/chapulinaaa/models/Wastebasket

And indeed, gzserver can't find it with this patch. Ticketed issue #2403, I'll decline this.

Independently of the approach we decide to take for Fuel, I think we will need to use gazebo/ignition transport to communicate the new paths to gzserver for the editors and the "Add Path" button.
